name: Jellies
description:
Take control over one Jelly Cube at a time, where you can move it, make it jump and most importantly, freeze it to make a platform for the next jelly in line. Go through 10 different levels, each presenting it's own challenge, and find your creative way to overcome various obstacles.

And keep in mind:

Getting candy is the objective of our little Jelly cube buddies, and "One for all, all for one" is the key to achieve their goals.
